sentences.en: Twenty-seven million working days are lost each year due to work accidents and sickness.
sentences.cn: 由于工伤事故和疾病，每年损失掉2700万个工作日。

sentences.en: Tuition for the Master of Social Work program, for example, will cost twenty-seven thousand dollars in the coming year.
sentences.cn: 例如，接下来一年社会工作硕士项目的学费将会是27000美元。

sentences.en: When I was twenty-seven years old, I was a mining-broker's clerk in San Francisco, and an expert in all the details of stock traffic.
sentences.cn: 我二十七岁的时候，在旧金山的一个矿业经纪公司当职员，精通股票交易的所有细节。
